AGBCheck module¶

Created on Feb 01, 2016

author:Svende Landwehrkamp, Enrico Reich

Contains functions to check textfeatures, like: Trimming the Text to relevant part, check the Occurence of keywords check the language of the text

AGBCheck.checkJS(xml)¶

Check if there are curly braces inside given xml-string as an Indication for Javascript

Parameters:xml (string) – xml string to check
Returns:true if there is a pair of curly braces
AGBCheck.check_keywords(xml)¶

Check for Keywords like ‘datenschutz’ to make sure it is a valid German Privacy Policy

Parameters:xml (string) – xml string to check
Returns:true of false
AGBCheck.cutting(xml)¶

Trying to check for Additional Text at the start and end of the XML. If there is text found that can be omitted, cut it from the string and return the shortened version.

Parameters:xml (string) – xml string to check
Returns:shortened String
Return type:string
AGBCheck.language_detect(xml)¶

Try to detect the Language of the XML-Text

Parameters:xml (string) – xml string to check
Returns:string like en/de
